content.detailedDescription: On 7-4-2009, at 2:56am to 2:58am i was on the roof of a high rise building, laying back hoping to catch sight of a meteor when a dark gray object with 2 lights moved into my range of view. it was moving at a slow speed ( about as fast as a slow airplane) over the city of philadelphia art museum area. it was traveling from north to south directly overhead and had no sound. the lights were located on each end or to be more specific (in the middle of the circumference of the ends, underneath) they were not blinking and were as bright as the stars around them. the object blocked out the stars as it moved and you could see its gray silhouetted on the dark blue or black of the skies background. it was cigar shaped with a bulge in the middle on one side. the ends were rounded like a cylinder. it was moving sideways with the bulge leading, not long ways. there were no windows that i could see. at arms length it was the length of my thumb. the sky was clear, almost pristine except for the light pollution from the city. just before i lost sight of the object i observed panels opening and closing on the ends, condensing vapor coming off of the objects surface like it was getting very cold. it then appeared to tilt up and quickly faded into the darkness of the sky in a kind of haze. in my opinion it was as large as a commercial air plane but it���s hard to be all conclusive about its size or its distance when there is no point of reference. but the details i saw make me feel that it wasn���t that far away. i'm still looking up at where it was, facing south when another light appeared from the north traveling as fast as a shooting star, made a long 90��� turn without slowing down and shot off to the east. how do i feel about this event, well it rocks my sense of reality.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with a bulge in the middle on one side

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:46 pm on saturday night 06/27/09, my wife and i left our house in order to reset her mom���s vcr / tv after a power outage caused by a storm. we all tend to stay up late on weekends, and we wanted to get this done to have sunday free.

as we drove west on interstate 70, and approached the i-435 interchange, i noticed a strange orange light low in the sky, to the south of i-70, and west of i-435. my wife asked if i saw the light in the sky, and i said i did. it was about the same color orange as the streetlights commonly used in metropolitan areas. later, my wife commented that it seemed more white at first, but i did not notice this.

we kept watching it as we got onto i-435 and proceeded south. the light seemed to be moving southward slowly. i tried to pull over to the side of the highway to get a better look, but was unable to do so due to traffic. i was finally able to pull over somewhere between 51st st and 350 highway.

i grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look as my wife tried to get a photo. unfortunately, she wasn���t able to get a photo. i did get a pretty good look at the source of the light through the binoculars. it seemed to be almost a shield shape with a long spire pointing downward. it was a bright orange color, but not at all blinding. the long point seemed to be moving from left to right as if the object/craft/device was slowly rotating on its vertical axis.

i was able to observe it for approximately 10 ���12 seconds, then it just faded out. it did not click off suddenly ��� like someone turning off a light ��� but more like someone used a dimmer switch, and went from bright to black in approximately 3 ��� 4 seconds.

we watched for a couple minutes, then started southward again. we saw the object one more time as we approached the vicinity of 87th st. it was much farther south, i would approximate roughly 8 miles or so. it almost appeared as if it had separated into three separate objects, but due to cloudy conditions, i cannot be entirely sure of this.

when we first noticed it, it appeared to be 8 ��� 10 degrees above the horizon, and about the size of a small marble held at arm���s length. it did not change altitude significantly during the time we observed it, and did not exhibit any rapid maneuvers or changes in speed. it seemed to travel in a southerly direction, with no deviation in either speed or direction.

i did not experience any feelings of fright, or anxiety, mostly it was wonder and fascination. i have included a photoshop rendering of what i observed as closely as i can remember it.
content.summary: Orange illuminated object travelling slowly to the south.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july the 3rd around 10 pm i decided to go out on my back deck and enjoy the country air. i live in watertown tn in the country. there is nothing behind my house but field ,creek ,tree line and cows. i saw the brightest star i have ever seen so i was watching it then it moved . it moved alot straight up about 10 degrees then stopped. the star would rotate ,looked bigger and brighter on one side than the other you could tell it was spinning. i grabbed my camera and took pictures. i did not see it again until the 6th of july. this time i seen it just pull up to the tree line. i watched it for a few seconds than went and got my tripod this time and my camera. i seen another smaller looking star pull up to it then merge with the bigger one.It rises pretty fast in the sky. i stopped watching it about midnite. the next night it was there and i have not seen it anymore. my sister and son witnessed it also. i have video and still pictures if u would like to see them. it is in the eastern sky.
content.summary: Appeared to be a star but  was moving.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8:45 at night. the sky was still slightly blue so it was not completely dark. i was sitting at the top of my stairs at my apartment. (let me just say a week and a half ago i saw the same thing around 4 in the morning, i told my mom about what i saw but she did not believe me. it was a very bright light, white bright light and had a small red light above it moving around, it would be there than vanish than come back.) anyways back to last night. so i saw something moving in the sky when i looked up. the way it was turning was so quickly and smoothly that there was no way it could be a plane or a helicopter. it made no sound at all. it had 2 blue lights and one red light. i screamed for my mom and she came running out of her room to where i was, i looked up at the object, oh yeah and i couldn't make out the shape because the lights were too bright and it was still a little too dark, anyways, my mom got over there and at this point it was just flying straight and looked pretty normal. my mom was like you called me out here to look at a plane in the sky. i didn't say anything and we both kept staring at it. all of the sudden it started moving up and down like it would drop 100 feet and than go back up again way to smoothly and easily to be anything like a helicopter or plane, it was turning very quickly also, like it'd be going in one direction and in a split second it'd be going the opposite way. me and my mom were speechless. i looked at her and asked her to explain what that could possibly be and she just laughed. she did not have any idea what that could possibly be. she started nervously laughing. we watched it for another 5 minutes and it started flying away towards the west and all of the sudden it completely vanished. about 2 seconds later it showed up in a completely different part of the sky. so it vanished and than popped up on the opposite side of where it vanished. impossible thing for a plane or helicopter to do. my mom looked at me and was like how in the world could it do that. we stayed out there for about 10 minutes watching this thing vanish and come back and do turns and smooth flips making no sounds. than one of our neighbors came out who lives below me. he looked up at me and my mom staring into the sky and was like what are you guys looking at. we didn't say anything so he looked up in the direction we were looking. he was like oh a plane..? the object was again flying straight so looked kinda normal. than it started doing those 180 turns and going up and down the guy stared at it and pulled out his camera phone and was freaking out. he tried to take a picture but of course it didn't come out good. being a cell phone camera. i can't even take picture of a huge full moon on my camera phone. anyways, it started getting far away and vanished behind trees. the guy ran out into the parking lot on the phone telling his friends what he saw, while looking for it. my mom still didn't know what to say, and i went inside to call friend and tell her. i came back out and my mom was still staring in the sky, i looked up and the object was gone but now smaller lights that were further away began to pop up in the sky out of no where. they were sparkly to the point where they looked like they were on fire. again with red and blue lights around them. i don't know what this was. it was definitely not a plane or helicopter or a jet or anything like that because those can't vanish and pop back into the sky or morph around like that. it was both fascinating and a little disturbing.
content.summary: Red and blue lights. not a plane or helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
On july 8, 2009, at approximately 10:30 p.M., i was returning from a friend's house east of gunnison, co, heading west on us 50. when i first noticed the object, i was approximately eight miles east of town. the object was to the northwest, brighter than venus, and not very high in the sky, maybe 15-20 degrees of elevation, barely above the hilltops. at first, i thought it was a plane with its landing lights on approaching the gunnison airport.

after a few minutes of watching it and watching the road for oncoming traffic and wildlife, i noticed that the light had an oval shape, and that it was indeed getting larger. because i was moving, i couldn't tell for sure if it was too, so i pulled onto the shoulder and stopped. yes, it was moving, and moving east at a fair clip, about the speed typical of aircraft around an airport. it then began to arc to the south, actually heading almost in my direction. and, it kept getting larger, and the shimmering more pronounced. 

at this point, i still thought: a plane. in fact, on the trailing edge, a reddishness, not a distinct point, but a reddishness was visible intermittently, though the reddish color was not cycling regularly, just visible now and then.

as it continued arcing in my direction, it grew to an amazing size, say, 20-25 percent as wide as a full moon, and the larger it became, the more it shimmered, but still i thought it was a plane coming in for a landing, or, maybe, i wanted to believe that. i'll confess: a light that bright and big, and arcing in my direction unsettled me just a tad.

when the object was about 60 degrees overhead, it abruptly disappeared. at that point, i began to wonder about its being a plane. had the intermittent reddishness actually been landing lights, at the distance it seemed to be from me, fairly close, i would have seen the running lights. no running lights were visible. the object had vanished.

i pulled back onto the highway immediately, thinking that maybe it had dropped behind a nearby hill, though, i didn't really see how that could have been possible because i'd been watching it intently. i guess it's the rational mind looking for a rational explanation.

it was nowhere to be found, and at that point i became confident that it was "unidentifiable," at least by me. first, very few aircraft land at the gunnison airport at night, and no large aircraft land at night. second, i've lived here 28 years, and have never seen any landing lights as bright or as big as this object. third, as i approached town, the runway lights were off.

and, this is the second such object i've seen this year in this valley. on march 16. at approximately 10 p.M. with clear and starry skies, a friend and i were returning from a meeting in crested butte, when i saw a light that at first i thought was an outdoor light on a house up on the slopes of red mountain. i watched it wondering why i'd never seen such a bright light before on my numerous trips between gunnison and crested butte. then, i noticed that it seemed to be  above red mountain. i pointed it out to my friend who confirmed it was above the mountain. it was night, the road was a bit snowy, and we were ready to be home after a long meeting, so we didn't pull off the highway. it wasn't as bright as last wednesday's object, though it was about as bright as venus. in fact, i thought maybe it was venus (the rational mind again), though i knew venus probably had set.  we watched it for 3-4 minutes before it too disappeared, i mean clicked off abruptly.

i am an amateur astronomer, and i've been watching the skies for more than 50 years. i've seen satellites, the iss, jupiter and venus, meteors, several sky-crossing fireballs, aircraft of all sorts, balloons, and yes, geese. lol  i've no idea what either of these two lights were, and i've never seen anything in the sky as large as last wednesday's object, or as bright. 

oh, i definitely had a premonition before seeing the light in march. and after wednesday's light, i feel like i will see another, and, crazy as it sounds, maybe more than just see another.
content.summary: Extremely bright oval shape, brightest object i've ever seen other than the sun or moon.

content.detailedDescription: I live in placitas, nm, about 4 miles north from the northern base of where the sandia mountain range begins.  friday evening july 10th i was riding my bike on the mesa (on blm land) near where i live.  it was dusk and the sunset was behind me as i headed east on a dirt trail.  suddenly, in front of me by approximately 20-25 ft, hovering at ground level, a 6' x 6' semi-translucent form which had a wavy appearance (like water) crossed the path, heading south into a deep ravine/arroyo next to the path. i called out, "who's there?" to know one.  the slight color of this mass was a deep red, but the color was barely visible.  i stopped my bike at the point it crossed and looked over into the arroyo, but i didn't see anything and as the drop-off into the arroyo is quite steep, i didn't want to get too close to the edge.  as i have seen 2 other different types of ufo's (solid mass) i quite didn't know what to think of this.  still, i knew i'd seen something.  the following evening (7/11/09) at 9:30pm, i had just pulled out of my driveway and and was about 200 ft. east of my house going about 15 mph, when the same object was caught in my headlights - same size, still "ululating" like a wave w/ a tinge of the dark red color, crossing the dirt road in front of me by about 25 ft again, this time heading north towards the blm (bureau of land mgmt property) into the darkness.  outside of my headlights, you could not see it. i was surprised to have seen this "thing" twice and my experience from the prior evening was validated. both times the "thing" seemed to take no notice of me and therefore did not stop or do anything other than go on its way. i've returned to the places where i saw it and saw no evidence the "thing" had adversely affected the terrain.  lastly, these events occurred w/in 1 mile from each other.
content.summary: Semi-translucent 6' x 6' ululating wave in front of me on bike ride.

content.detailedDescription: I want to report a stange event that happened during the summer of 2007.This is not about a sighting of an object in the sky.Its more about an unusual person i met during the coarse of conducting a cash business i operate on the streets of toronto,canada.This would be a tourist business called the "rickshaw".Its a two wheeled cart that seats between 3-4 people the driver pushes the cart forward from behind a bar that extends out from the wheelhubs.This is done with no assistance from engines or chain pulleys.I would like to paraphrase this report to stop and make an honest admission of sorts. i am fascinated by the ufology phenomenon,i must have read at least two dozen books on the subject:j allen hynek,stanton friedman,whitley streiber,david jacobs and bud hopkins.Ive evan gotten a hold of a book by eduard j. ruppelt who published a paperback in the late fiftie,(ive read it twice) he wrote of his experiences/perceptions as head of project bluebook.  on a night in mid  july 2007 i was covering what is called in the biz a "letout" of the rock group the police,(which helps pin point the exact date;however i dont have that info at this time!!)upon reflecting on this encounter i realized that a series of incidents contributed to this situation.I hope the following details do not seem overly convaluted i think they carry a certain importance towards the understandind of this situation.     that day was going badly for me because the day before i had gotten into a brutal physical confrontation with another driver for reasons that are unimportant to this reportage.The fighting left me sore and tender in the facial area and  most importantly emotionally drained.For this reason it set up a crucial circumstance for the unfolding of this encounter.That is the breaking of a basic pattern related to "rickshawing" which is in order to solicit your services you typically face and call out to the public.Instead because i was in  quiet and uncommunitative state not only was i not talking i was standing behind the backside of the rickshaw blocked from view by the passerbys.Not surprisingly the other runners picked up their rides and i was the only one left.Resigned to the fact that his day was not going to be very profitable.I then heard a ladies soft voice from directly behind me asking if i was available for hire,startled more because i didnt want to let this opportunuty slip thru my fingers i turned quickly to see her but she turned away just as fast to move around the front of the shaw cross the bar and get herself seated.From what i could notice of her profile was that she was kind of 'plainish' shoulder lenght brown hair,basically cut. she might have been no more than forty years of age. her tunic like top was like a sweater and their was something peculiar in the tone of the purplish colouring of the cloth,what little time i had to observe of her their was something you couldnt quite define in any obvious way.As this is happening she asks to be taken into the downtown area whereever i think is the best spot.Again hard to define yet something that stands out just enough you can notice it vaguely.The timber in her voice had this kind of resonance it carried a kind of 'hypnotic cadence' to it that makes you want to agree with whatever is being said.The accent could have been some sort of obscure easteran european slant to it.As i pull the bar around to position it for the street entrance another lady about ten years younger gets into the rickshaw,i give her a quick glance she seems normal enough.Now its my turn to cross over the bar normally i'd kneel down with my back to my riders then pick up the bar.Then walk/run forward.But  because i was'nt inside the bar of the rickshaw like normally,i was going to kneel down grab the bar then twist around and then start forward.As i go to pick up the bar i'm looking at the ground but my head is almost level with my passengers.Whithin my peripheal vision i can notice something most unusual about the first lady.Her eyes are enormous and pitch black with no white matter in the socket area what so ever .The impact of this observation is momentous for reasons related to my understanding stated before hand of this report.The obvious features of her face could very well mean but one thing,i was standing a few feet away from some sort of alien being.A moment in time i  thought i would never believe to be a reality.It's one thing to read about it,fantasize about it.It;s impossible to describe the kind of exhilaration that takes hold of you.So instead of turning around to grip the front section of the bar to start moving forward,i put the bar back down and stand up to let her know that i am interested in talking/confronting her.I lock eyes with the 'strange lady',for about twenty seconds or so.She and i just checked each other out and it was just an amazing thing you coudn't escape the fact the fact that behind or immersed within the dark lens of the eye cap was a cornea and pupil .One thing you can tell about someone when you first meet them is a sense of intelligence they give of thru the eyes its  something that is visually apparent that gives you a strong impression of their awareness or perceptivity,(thats how i understand it anyways).If their is one thing that was alien about this person was the intensity level of that sense.It was 'astronomical'.(ha,ha),that is conveyed from this persons eyes.Her eyes exuded an animated cat like zeal and ferocity.,but their was no central slit running down the middle of the pupil the way a feline would have,it just felt that way,then their was these squiggly  lines shooting out from the center area.The pupil itself i have no memory for.In one respect their was  a sense of playfullness about the expression and then was  a sense of seriousness or evan a "meaness"; decisiveness,etc.There are more details i want to report at another time based any further  future correspondance.Thank you for reading my report.
content.summary: Person to person oddity

content.detailedDescription:
this is ben woods and we took another trip out to where we collected the photograph for mufon report #17607 submitted june 22nd.  the photograph was posted on teh website i use to post research results during correspondence with interested ufo hunters and trackers at http://www.Secretetsaucers.Com
  we were able to collect an additional photograph this morning and have included it here with the report.  our camera picked up the saucer at 5:40am  at our position 35 miles south of las vegas near the lake mead national recreational area.  this is area is listed as a frequently visited location for ufos and extraterrestrials(lake mead, hoover dam, grand canyon, good desert).  we had gone out on this particular morning for casual tracking and did not expect to see the disc.  when the saucer came into view it was traveling at approximately 1100mph towards our position(high velocity horizontal flight) and slowed into a hover over the area before it turned and faded out of view to the west.
  for questions about this incident send me an email.
content.summary: Nevada disc again captured outside of las vegas by ben woods on july 12th at 5:45am

content.detailedDescription:
August 2008. have seen a number of ufos over the past 50 years. have also had the misfortune to see a few of the beings that apparently go along with them. in august of last year i encountered a being unlike i had ever seen before.
was late in the afternoon, i was in the kitchen getting a soda when i looked up and out into the hallway, in the open bedroom door was an entity that literally made my heart skip a beat. it was a little taller than i am, looked to be a reptile of some sort, had bright yellow eyes with vertical pupils. it was wearing what appeared to be a one piece dark blue jumpsuit. there was some kind of insignia on the lower arm. i could not take my eyes away from its eyes. it seemed to have an expression of disdain or disgust or possibly anger; hard to tell but it did not give off a good feeling. 
we were maybe 8 ft. apart and just continued to stare at one another. i finally lowered my head and closed my eyes and when i looked up it was gone. needless to say, i slept with most of the lights on that night. this was not a pleasant experience
content.summary: Angry alien ?

content.detailedDescription: Watching fireworks in ne minneapolis, and can say, without a doubt that myself and 3 others witnessed an unidentified flying object on july 4th at around midnight. it was a single object dark grey in color, round, silent, with a red/orange light on the bottom center flying in a frisbee like path through the sky. i know it was not a helicopter or airplane as both were in the sky at the same time and had no resemblance to this object. this object was silent and smooth moving. unexplainable. we watched the object as it flew from the northeast to the southwest, directly over our heads, almost as if flying toward the moon then veered to the east and descended to the horizon out of sight. its flight path can best be described as like that of a frisbee, arching through the sky. the object flew at around 500' or less.
content.summary: Circular or square object, silent, orange/red light on center bottom, frisbee type flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out star gazing, as i usually do on a clear night, and within forty-five minutes of my viewing caught sight of peculiar celestial activity.

the first two points of light (verry faint) i could have mistaken for satellites, had it not for them moving in unison in the same direction. initially they were close together when i spotted them, and shifted slightly farther apart. then to my surprise, i spotted an even fainter third point of light to the left of the other two moving with the same trajectory and speed as the other. together the three points of light moved due south/ southeast untill i lost sighting of them, as they drifted into a plume of smoke comming from a fire my neighbors were having.

to make matters more interesting still, two new points of light (possibly even the same from the original three)began to fly due north at a higher rate of speed than the original three. i could have mistaken this for another coincidental sattellite crossing had it not been for the second point of light following the northbound trajectory of the first one i seen. these two lights where in the same line (trajectory), however the one behind the first lagged behind and eventually increased speed back to its original form.

this event happened withing five to seven minutes.

i had spotted a fair number of satellites within the course of the night, with nothing out of the ordinary, save this event.
content.summary: Three faint objects flying in slow formation in the upper atmosphere heading due south

content.detailedDescription:
Hello i'm 12 years old in november 2008 ( 11 years old ) y was in my recess then it finished on  1:30
, at 1:36 we where entering the classroom when i hear a boy shouting ! what's that ! when i go to see in the window with another kid our teacher saw us and tell us get out the classroom!!!!!!!!!!  .

i saw 3 orange balls in a triangle formation , from my point of view they were of the size of a coin , but if a would see them near they were giants!!!  they were in the mountain to the right side of the central avila mountains , first i think they where parachutes but then i thing ufo? 

they start to move from the mountain to a giant gloud in 15 min. then they start to turn white until in 20 min. until they  disappeared in the clouds then my teacher told me enter to the classroom.

thank you!
content.summary: Triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the park near the philadelphia art museum waiting for the late fireworks display. at about 10pm i saw two lights to the west or northwest, moving rapidly in a straight line across the sky from north to south, one behind the other. what was most odd was their erratic speeds: the second light kept speeding up and slowing down, like it was playfully chasing the first one; it would nearly catch up to the first, then slow or stop and fall back. i'd guess the sighting lasted about 30 seconds before the lights disappeared behind trees.

these lights were not bright -- the sky was very illuminated from the city lights, and only a couple of the brightest stars were visible, and the lights i saw were about the same brightness as those stars. i did not get any sense of their color. they seemed to be at a high altitude and moving at a good clip, but the erratic speeds made made their motion quite distinct from planes or helicopters or satellites.

i had a flip cam with me and attempted to film it, but nothing is visible -- too low-light for the ccd, and too jerky. my girlfriend was with me but she wasn't wearing her contacts and couldn't see what i was pointing at. no one else nearby appeared to be paying attention (there was a concert playing at the time.)
content.summary: Two objects moving fast and erratically north to south

content.detailedDescription: In passing i saw a corpse of a hairless, dull copperish colored animal that looked like the dog-like animal videoed by state trooper shown on tv. on right side of road, intact with no obvious dismemberment or abdominal swelling (as if fresh). i saw it as clearly as possible at highway speed in closest lane. i am well versed in north american wildlife and could not place animal as a fox or coyote because of size, coat, or body type. shaven house dog maybe - pointer or setter sized.
content.summary: Cuprachabra

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were having a late dinner outside on the patio when i noticed what i thought to be a star "blink out" to my right. it seemed to be about 15 degrees north of tracy, so it probably would've been directly above the discovery bay area. it was a mostly clear night. what we saw in essence was a light that slowly blinked on and off at irregular intervals. it was about as bright as the star sirius. the object was not quite stationary; it moved around slightly but not at particularly high speeds. whatever it was was also pretty high in the air. i could only make out a single white light. we live in southern tracy, ca so we actually see a lot of flight traffic (usually at about 40,000 feet) so i'm familiar with how airplanes look and move. it didn't seem to be an airplane (it hovered, the lights blinked too slowly & the lights weren't multicolored). it was too high to be a helicopter, there was no noise and also at the end, the light blinked out. the entire sighting lasted for just about a minute (it slowly blinked 3 times total) the light then flashed on then faded out completely. i still can't explain what it was, so i'm reporting it as a ufo in my book.
content.summary: Slowly blinking "star" near tracy, ca

content.detailedDescription: In passing i saw a corpse of a hairless, dull copperish colored animal that looked like the dog-like animal videoed by state trooper shown on tv. on right side of road, intact with no obvious dismemberment or abdominal swelling (as if fresh). i saw it as clearly as possible at highway speed in closest lane. i am well versed in north american wildlife and could not place animal as a fox or coyote because of size, coat, or body type. shaven house dog maybe - pointer or setter sized.
content.summary: Cuprachabra

content.detailedDescription: Cuando me habia despertado repentinamente lo que sucedio es que a mi me gustaria ser un fututo ufologo entonces me dio curiocidad de ver por la ventana cuando derrepente ahi una estrella muy brillante yo me pregunte es un ovni? i espere un momento i note que no era despues segui buscando y derrepente hay una esfera q lentamente se desplaza hacia el oeste pero yo me dije no puede ser un satelite por que su luz parpadeaba constantemente tampoco un elicoptero aunque usara esa opcion de que el elicoptero estubiera en modo silencioso su altura era incapaz de que fuera asi tampoco era un avion x q por donde yo vivo estoy un poco cerca del aeropuerto i era imposible que bolara tan alto y tan despacio maximo tendria que aver dos luces de sus dos alices pero la distancia que tenia era como la de un satelite entonces como el celular lo teni en la pieza de mi madre le dije mam��� un ovni i mi padre se desperto y me reclamo que no lo siguiera molestando mas entonces me devolvi y se habia ido es ovjeto esa es mi historia y para que vean lo que dije de mis padres contactenmen y mi madre les respondera si me dijieron eso ademas no alcanse a sacar algunas pruebas en todo caso mi celular era imposible que lo detectara.
content.summary: Cambiava de color brevemente y era una especie de forma de bola de fuego etc.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brothers had goe to town at about 11:30 pm to check our dog at the pound and as we were going up the road behind our home there was a red flash of light and then the car slowely pulled into the drive way and we had lost 4 hours and it fet like we were gone only 20 minuets
content.summary: Red flash of light and 4 hours were lost

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch with my two dogs facing the big dipper.  i have limited view due to my porch roof.  i saw a shooting star heading from south to north through the dipper. i then noticed a star by the upper handle side of the dipper bowl & thought "it's so clear that i could see a star that i didnt realize was there".  then i noticed it was  moving. i stepped off my porch to see more sky. the object headed  upward by the higher star that forms the dipper bowl & continued se toward casseopeia.  i thought it was a satellite but it was weaving slightly, somewhat changing direction & speed was not constant.  i knew it was something different & was excited. it made a slight bend in a star cluster just nw of casseopeia & went straight upward very quickly away from earth - i was stunned!  i look at the night sky all the time and have never seen anything like it. about 30 seconds after it was out of sight i saw a satellite heading very near the area where the object diappeared that was travelling from s to n.  i then went to my back yard & continued to look at the n sky until about 2:30 am.  i saw two more shooting stars in the n sky during that time.  i believe in ets & have been envious of those who have seen ufos.  as much as i look at the sky i've always thought i should see one.....Now i have!
content.summary: Star-like object flew high across sky (not straight) & disappeared straight up.
Bright orange square lights.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were coming home from defiance, oh at my sister's birthday dinner. we were driving home on u.S. 24 when my girlfriend seen something strange pulsing/blinking brilliant white light moving west in the same direction as us. she drew my attention to it and we watched it. the pulsing/blinking white light was very far away but it was still about the size of a quarter in the sky and seemed very out of place. it would pulse/blink every 2 or 3 seconds. when it would blink out you couldn't see anything producing the light. we watched it for about a minute and it then stopped and hovered, it then went straight up through the clouds and at the same speed it immediately dropped back down exactly in the same path it went up and then stopped exactly where it was before. then it started moving in the same direction again, but after another couple of minutes going west it simply suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white pulsing/blinking light seen in daylight sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in a field, painting a horse shed, when i took a short break. i was sitting on my truck's tailgate, looking to the east towoard my horse and saw a bright, flashing light at about the 4 o'clock position in the eastern sky. the object was above the house next to our property. it appeared to "flutter," as though a diamond or triangle was blowing in the breeze. my first thought was that it was a mylar balloon, but it was in the far distance and shouldn't have been so visible, had it been a balloon. as i watched, the light would pulsate, going from very faint to a flashing bright. the object approached a small bank of clouds and i thought i would lose it in the clouds, but i could see it pulsing and fluttering as it went through the small bank of clouds. a friend was in the area, but she couldn't see the object,as her far sight was bad. the object flashed very bright a couple of times, and i could see that it was heading east, at what appeared to be a high rate of speed. it didn't appear to be an airplane, because the flashing of light appeared to be almost rythmical. an airplane reflecting the sunlight would've reflected it and then been lost to the eye, but this object continued to be visible by flashing. it appeared to be "fluttering;" like a leaf in the wind, but stayed stable with the horizon. after about 5-7 minutes, the object was lost behind the visible horizon. i am always looking up, i like to fly; i try to identify the planes i see flying overhead.  i'd sure like to know what it was that i saw!
content.summary: Pulsing, fluttering, light seen moving east toward mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
June 9, 2009 at approximately 8 pm mst, while walking through the alberta legislature grounds on the descending steps to the bowling green, we noticed a strange flying object moving very slowly overhead northbound from over the river valley coming right toward where we were strolling. it was completely clear outside with the exception there were a few minor clouds. it started out looking almost black and cube-shaped, but as it moved closer overhead, it seemed to appear to be silvery, almost with luminescence. there were tiny little flashes of light around it, but they were difficult to see against the bright blue sky. those were almost instantaneous. the large one did not flash in and out; it was constant and steady it its movement. it continued to move right over our heads and appeared to have blue and pink bubble-like nodules. it moved slowly, and was completely silent. its height was about a 150 feet above. i had my camera, and did manage to capture some shaky video. it continued right on over the grounds over the legislature building and we couldn't see it anymore.

it was odd because we had a clear view of the sky coming down the steps at almost eye-level, and had noticed how slow this thing was moving. i was busy staring at it, thinking "bizarre! there's no way that's what i think it is..." when my friend elbowed me to pull out my camera (i'd intended to do some shots of flowers...So i'm glad i had it with me).

it was really exciting: we couldn't wait to get back home to the computer to see what we got. thought i'd share it here.
content.summary: Luminescent ufo with surounding orbs.

content.detailedDescription: My son, girlfriend, and her father attended the battle creek airshow on 7/4/09. honestly,we didn't notice anything out of the ordinary. however, when my girlfriend e-mailed the pictures we took to me, while i was cropping and zooming, i noticed a dot in the sky. when i zoomed in, it was not just a dot. there was something else in the sky that was out of the ordinary. it has a mass to it, and is unlike any aircraft that i am aware of. at first i thought that it might be an error or a piece of dust on the lense, but the object showed up in 3 of the photographs, out of about 20. it is in the first picture above a helicopter that was flying around 2:00 when the air show started, and it also shows up durring the thunderbird demonstration that ended around 4:45. i am interested to see if anyone else captured the object. i am attaching the photos unedited to give reference to the distance, and altitude.
content.summary: Unidentified objet at battle creek air show.

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding a motorcycle at about 11:30 pm july 11th 2009.  i was headed north between booker texas and elmwood oklahoma.  the skies were very dark and very clear.  i was going about 60-65 mph. off to my right or east, i noticed a bright light, which i thought was a planet i had sort-of identified earlier when i was headed east.  it took me a second to realize that the light was brighter than the planet and to the north of the where the planet should have been and was.  i checked my mirrors, and down the road in front of me for traffic, there was none so i looked to my right or east, and again looked at the object for a few seconds and realized it was moving across the star-field behind it.  it looked like maybe a small airplane with a landing light on, by far the brightest thing in the sky, but the light was just a solid whitish light.  it was headed what looked to be straight south, and it was a little north of straight east of me.  it also appeared to be one to three miles from me and maybe less than a mile above ground level, don't know hard to tell.  i am about half-way between booker and the oklahoma state line.  i decide to stop to watch it, i'm not in a hurry and i guess it got me curious.  i slow down and stop and as i am stopping in the road i notice the light has been getting brighter, just 10 or 15 seconds in this whole deal has elapsed now, and a lot is happening at the same time. this thing is getting very bright, like streetlight bright at about a block or two, i'm riding a motorcycle and trying to look up at the sky and trying to stop at the same time without getting run-over.  okay now for the good part.  i have stopped in the road and between me getting stopped and glancing back and forth at the object this thing turns and accelerates. dramatically. unbelieveably fast.  it goes what appears to be about a 45 degree angle up and maybe due south-east, so now its headed up and away from me, and it got so bright for an instant that it might have lit up the ground around the area.  it looked like about half as fast as a shooting star would appear, super fast but watchable.  it accelerated from what appeared to be about 150 mph., to maybe 50 thousandish mph or faster.  just guessing only, yes speculation.  it stayed on the exact trajectory for about 15 seconds and i watched it until i had to look to each side of it to be able to see it.  as it was dissappearing from my sight it appeared to be curving to the south a little, maybe a optical illusion,  its possible the thing was now maybe satellite-high, or higher, thats what it looked like as it was dissappearing, maybe a dim satellite.  there was a jet in the area that might halve seen this, north of me and headed west. the moon rose exactly as this was happening if you want a exact time.  and as i was about to take off a south to north or north to south cant remember...Shooting star went across the horizon directly where i was watching. thats it.  this  all seemed matter of fact to me even though its the weirdest-coolest thing i've ever seen.  thought i'd tell some-one who might be interested. thanks. 
p.S. had earplugs in and left bike running never heard anything.  thanks.
content.summary: Slow moving star like object changed directions and took off.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside awaiting a fireworks display after our arts,crafts and food festival and there were 10 of us when one person looked at the sky that was south of us and the moon was full in the south and this object appeared east of the moon, which it came over the horizon from beaver county way which is south of ellwood ciy and it moved slowly to the north and when it came equal to the east of the moon its speed increased it went higher then it just disappeared. there were no clouds out , someone thought it maybe a medical helicopter but those sounds echo through this valley and i can always tell if a helicopter is coming in , it also had no other lights on it and it was round and did not look like a airplane either , the sun also had already set to our west so it was not a reflection off it ,  i also plotted a tracking point in the sky and kept watching over head and nothing flew over the house we were at, and no stars were present in the path . this lasted maybe 10 minutes and i know other people were on the roadway and i heard them talking about seeing it to.

 i felt i saw may first ufo. my reaction was normal i would say since i do believe in ufo's there has to be someone else out there besides us on earth. i did not take any action till now when i was trying to find sightings of this object on the internet that anyone else would have reported so i decided to report tonight one week later because i believe it was a ufo.
content.summary: Bright orange sphere no other lights on it

content.detailedDescription: Took dogs out in backyard for bathroom break before bed, they were barking and loud after a object about 10 ft outside our iron fence. called the dogs back in and our alpha dog would not come. noticed the extemely black object.  i thought it was a shadow at first and kept trying to figure out what it might be. we have had 3 cats disapear in the past few years and was trying to figure out if it was a crouching preditorial animal. my son went inside to get a flashlight and the object remained perfectly still and quite when we shown the light on it my son said oh, its just a black trashbag and we continued to walk toward it. then it suddenly moved toward us up to the fence, no head, feet,fur,just sort of like a black hole. we ran inside and locked the door,i looked for a camera and grabbed my cell phone to take a picture. my son didnt want me to go back out so tryed to crack the door to get a picture but it was gone. i was really freaked out about it, as a child my sisters and i found a charred circle behind our house that had been covered with dead grass clipping, the ground under was a perfectly round circle and the dirt was hard and melted, our parents didnt seem to be concerned and we went to the builders office of the developement to tell them.  none of the adults seemed to freaked out about it but me and my sisters still talk about it.The charred circle seemed to be much larger than this object,problably 6-10 ft.
content.summary: Black,on ground,roundish 1 ft high  3 ft across, silent, still, moved quickly toward us when we approached with flashlight.S

content.detailedDescription:
On 7/10/2009 i my husband and i went to bed around 1:30 am we were in bed for a few minutes and we heard a weird dat dat dat noise that was substantially loud, we live off of fort lewis and are used to the noise associated with the fort but in 9 years i have never had them randomly start shooting off at 1-2 in the morning.
     i got up and looked out the window to try and put an object to the noise (was it a horse caught in a fence or kicking at a barn wall, fire works? what was it) i didn't see anything so i went back to bed about 1-2 minutes later we heard it again but this time their were three different rounds of ammunition so my husband got up and looked out the window and said it was coming from fort lewis, he went back to bed a minute later it went off again and i got out of bed and my husband got out of bed we went to two different windows and looked outside, i had to view that was pointing to the fort i saw "tracers" from the ammunition that was being shot from fort lewis, i thought that was odd, again in 9 year i have never seen tracers off of ammunition from the fort.
      i continued to look outside and saw a blue spherical ball of light in the sky darting around and zig zagging through the sky it was very apparent that someone (weather it was fort lewis or a private party i don't know) was trying to "shoot down" this thing from the sky.
      the object was in the sky for about 10 seconds (that i saw) and it disappeared, just vanished once it was gone the shots stopped and we didn't hear anything for the rest of the night.
      in the morning i went to work (traveling north bound on 8th ave s) and as i drove by fort lewis i saw they had large wooden crates (7x7x5) with large yellow warrning signs tapped to the front of them that they were loading up onto army truck i don't know if this has anything to do with "someone" trying to shoot down the bouncy ball of light or not but found it to be odd.
content.summary: Was fort lewis trying to shoot down a ufo?

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in our backyard at approximately 10:32 pm. we saw an object in the distance appear to ascend from close to the ground and climb to about 5000 -10000 feet. the object was a yellow and red sphere that pulsated and changed colors and shape between yellow and red. it flew over our house silently and crossed the george bush iah westbound landing flight path. it pulsated and slowly flickered until it disappeared. we are 7 miles from the iah airport flight tower. they should have it on radar.
content.summary: Sighted pulsating yellow, red object. it flew siliently over our house perpendicular to the iah westbound landing flight path

content.detailedDescription:
On sat july 10th around 11pm i went to my back deck to see if our dog was ok, she hadn't been fed and i went to feed her.  i looked up at the sky because it was such a clear evening at the time it had rained earlier and storms were in the area but at this point it was clear.  i looked up and instantly a star i thought made a leap across the sky to me it looked like if i held out my arms straight out from my sides then held them above my head that is the distance it went and i'm sure in the sky that was a long way,  it did it instantly i told myself maybe i am mistaken so i watched and it moved again back instead of from side to side and it started twinkling it went from white to a light orange to red, so i got a chair and sat down and watched it a while then it slowly moved to the west of nashville where there were 2 more similar to it,.  this isn't the first ufo i have seen in my 49 years so i watched them a while then got tired, and went inside to get ready for bed,  just before i went to bed about 35mins later i stuck my head outside and looked in that direction and they were gone.  so star-like moving very fast and with 90 degree turns...

m youngblood
content.summary: Moving object, that was not a satilite
